name: stake.link
description: The SDL token performs three key functions: SDL is a fee token — staking SDL will return a percentage of all fees generated by the platform. This fee scales directly with the amount of LINK and rewards in the protocol. SDL is a governance token — voting will help shape the platform, determine future fees, and participant involvement. SDL provides priority staking access — stakers of SDL will be the first to deposit LINK at stake.link.
